page.title: 09The Village Hall, Craignish.
page.content: Craignish Village Hall has served the local community for over 30 years & is still the main meeting place for many clubs & societies, namely:- Community Council meetings, Playgroup, Bowls, Badminton & Exercise Clubs, Church social evenings (dances, whist etc) & coffee mornings,School concerts & PTA sales,Agricultural Club's Annual (root/grain/produce/crafts) Show,etc. Until Christmas 1984 (when newly lo- cated at hotel)the young children of the village were each year given a party by WRI members (who had always used the hall for their meetings). 22/6/85.School concert/ presentation to school bus operator (almost 50 yrs of service!).4/7/85.Village ceilidh to mark retirement of'the'shopkeeper who assured our'daily bread'for 38 years! HALL RUN BY COMMITTEE(Trust fund/char- itable status)WHO NOBLY TACKLE UPKEEP.
